meanings.definition: The act of making something better or improving a situation.
meanings.sent1: The amelioration of the school's facilities brought joy to the students.
meanings.sent2: The community saw an amelioration in living conditions after the new housing project.
meanings.sent3: The amelioration of the rainy weather made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was an amelioration to the harsh reality of the world.
meanings.sent5: The amelioration of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming better or more tolerable.
meanings.sent1: With time, the amelioration of his health was evident to all.
meanings.sent2: The gradual amelioration of the road conditions made driving safer.
meanings.sent3: The amelioration of the boring lecture made it almost enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an amelioration to his stressful day.
meanings.sent5: The amelioration of the old house turned it into a cozy retreat.

meanings.definition: A positive change or improvement in a situation.
meanings.sent1: The amelioration in her mood was noticeable after the good news.
meanings.sent2: The amelioration of the economy brought hope to the citizens.
meanings.sent3: His amelioration of the recipe made it a family favorite.
meanings.sent4: The amelioration of the park's appearance attracted more visitors.
meanings.sent5: The amelioration of the team's performance led to their victory.
